auth.description: Add location to your Mastodon post, and explore communities nearby.

error.invalid: That doesn’t look like a valid Mastodon server address.
error.required: Please enter the address of the Mastodon server you are on.

auth.divider: If you don’t feel like logging in,

home.log-in-to-see: Log in to see posts from people you follow, and explore communities nearby.
home.no-post: People you follow haven’t posted anything through Mastoplace yet.

new-post.log-in-to-write: You should log in to write a post.
new-post.log-in-and-write: Log in and write a post

error.required: Please enter the content of your post.
Please select the visibility of your post.

exact-location.title: Exact location
exact-location.description: Post a location that is slightly more precisely zoned than the approximate location.

include-location.title: Include location
include-location.description: Post a randomly weighted approximation of your location with a link to see what has been posted nearby.

log-in-to-see.description: Since the Mastoplace server doesn't store the content of your posts, you'll need to log in to view them through the Mastodon server you're on.
log-in-to-see.title: You should log in to see this post.

post.log-in-and-see: Log in and come back here

no-post.description: This post either doesn't exist, or you can't see it with the account you're logged in with.
no-post.title: That was close!

posts-nearby.no-location: You can't see the posts nearby because the original post doesn't have a location.
posts-nearby.no-post: There are no posts around this location.
posts-nearby.title: Posts nearby

button.delete-all: Delete the Mastoplace entry and Mastodon post
button.keep-mastodon-post: Delete the Mastoplace entry but not the Mastodon post

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this post?

post.end-of-list: This is the end of the list.

profile.log-in-to-see: You should log in to see your profile.
profile.log-in-and-see: Log in and see my profile
profile.no-post: You haven’t posted anything through Mastoplace yet.

delete-account.title: Delete Mastoplace account
delete-account.description: This is just about pressing some buttons.

description.primary: Delete posts published through Mastoplace from your Mastodon account ({{handle}}).
description.secondary: If you want to leave your posts on Mastodon, you can skip this step. However, if you change your mind later,  you will have to delete it manually from Mastodon. For the same reason, if you've previously deleted your Mastoplace information without deleting the Mastodon posts, this step will not delete the remaining posts. In these cases, consider using the #Mastoplace hashtag.

description.primary: Delete all entries including locations and post information associated with your Mastodon account ({{handle}}) from Mastoplace.
description.secondary: If this number is greater than the upper one, it means that you have already taken the first step or have deleted posts from Mastodon yourself.

description.primary: Revoke the permissions granted to Mastoplace in the Mastodon settings.
description.secondary: Press the button below to open your Mastodon settings, find entries named Mastoplace, and press Revoke.

button.open: Open {{server}} settings in a new tab

fourth.description: Log out and you're done. Goodbye!

public.no-post: There are no public posts that you can see for now.
